sheep.game
Class GameThread

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      sheep.game.GameThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, KeyboardListener, TouchListener
public class GameThread
extends java.lang.Thread
implements KeyboardListener, TouchListener

The GameThread contains all the States and is the main loop the game. It listens for keyboard and touch events and forwards these events to the current stack top. It also keeps track of time, and calls update and draw on the top stack element each loop iteration.
